Reviews.Title: Good picture for a low price
Reviews.Author: Bry Hayz
Reviews.Content: Overall, a great tv for the price. Needed it for a bedroom. The only issue I had was trying to program my direct tv remote. Dtv doesn't have this model listed, and a pain to figure out the code *side note, the code is 10812.

Reviews.Title: great deal nice tv good for tv use and computer use!
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: This TV is much more than I needed. Was cheapest price for 1080p, good size for up close gaming, and fit perfectly on my desk! Now I get to play all my games in HD, and if necessary can hook it up to my computer for dual monitor action. The TV has actually decent sound for the size- I find myself just shelving my headphones most of the time due to comfortability.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Mariabx485
Reviews.Content: MY SON LOVES HOW CLEAR THE PICTURE IS AND ESPECIALLY ON HIS CONSOLES. IT LOOKS PERFECT AND COLORS STAND OUT BEAUTIFULY. I HAVE THE 42INCH SO HAD TO GET THE 22'' FOR MY SON..ITS TRULY THE BEST TV YET..AND ESPECIALLY THE PRICE IS CRAZY CHEAP...NEED TO BUY ANOTHER ONE.

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse 22" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dennis L. Redding
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little TV.  I use it in our office/guest bedroom as a TV and computer monitor.  The 720p display limits resolution when used with a computer.  Overall, this unit performs very well.

Reviews.Title: Great... for about 30 days
Reviews.Author: MP
Reviews.Content: I purchased this with some hope that it would be a great TV for the price and last for a few years.  Well, It is working.  But a bright green vertical line has formed on the screen about a month in to use.  Of course, the box and everything had been tossed.  I didn't even check on if I could return it or not as life became a bit hectic.  The channels will often freeze on me as well.  The sound, picture quality, ease of use ... that all is great but I would have spent some more money if I had known this green line would show up.  I can still watch TV and doesn't affect the actual quality of the picture.  Just annoying.

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse does not stand by product.
Reviews.Author: scoob
Reviews.Content: Bought a tv on Black Friday from Westinghouse. TV defective. Westinghouse will not stand by warranty. Product is subpar. Customer service ineffective.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT TV FOR KITCHEN
Reviews.Author: katie
Reviews.Content: A MOST HAVE TV IF YOU NEED IT TO BE CLOSE AND LOAD. REALLY WORKS WELL WITH MY IPOD AND OTHER GADGETS I CONNECT TO IT
